articles.author: Dailymail.com
articles.title: Singer Manuela accuses Taylor Swift of stealing visuals from her visual EP for Anti-Hero music video - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manuela has taken to social media to accuse Taylor Swift of stealing visuals from her visual EP for the Anti-Hero music video, which was released on Friday.
articles.content:
Singer Manuela has taken to social media to accuse Taylor Swift of copying ideas from her visual EP for the Anti-Hero music video, which was released on Friday.
